page.title: 17Media
page.content: Daily and weekly newspapers, magazines and comics, are delivered by teenagers. Similarly, free advertising papers are delivered to every home. Sunday papers are delivered by one family and helpers to 6 villages. Long Marstons' Church Newsletter is distributed with the monthly Marston Sicca News, which began 3 years ago (funded from parish rates, edited by 3 women and duplicated in Mickleton). Pebworths' monthly newsheet, The Piper, was started l3 years ago, is edited by 4 women and printed in Stratford. Its circulation, including postal distribution, costs Â£2 for ll issues. Both newsletters contain reports of organisations, parish meetings,local events and advertisements. The news sheets are invaluable introductions to village life.
